about_the_game:
This DLC‘s contains new story expand you can read. You can learn about some daily life with other friends at school after Gotus wakes up.
Experience the life from the perspective of Gotus and gain unforgettable happiness in it.

She opened eyes , from the endless slumber .
She’s gazing , rejoicing at being with the welfare .
It’s fine . It’s fine , like this .

fullgame.name: Aenas-猫与海：序章(Aenas-Cat and The Sea-Prologue)

legal_notice: All materials of this product are original , please do not use arbitrarily .
name: Aenas-Cat and The Sea : Gotus‘s Diary

short_description: A simple-designed book , the unwilling to forget , daily welfare is writing on . You will see the daily lives of various characters in this DLC, and she , gaze at everything around her without words.
